mapper.update: update faq set help_category_id = #{help_category_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where faq_id = #{faq_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by faq_id desc) as faq, f.* from faq f where help_category_id = #{help_category_id}) f2 where f2.faq between #{start} and #{end}
select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by faq_id desc) as faq, f.* from faq f where title like concat('%',#{search},'%')) f2 where f2.faq between #{start} and #{end}
select * from faq where help_category_id = #{help_category_id} limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select * from faq where title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
select count(*) from faq where help_category_id = #{help_category_id}
select count(*) from faq where title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
